column1: In the [[The Book of Lost Tales
column2: earliest versions]] of the [[legendarium]], '''Peleg''' was the son of [[Indor]] and the father of [[Tuor]]. Therefore like Tuor he probably belonged to the [[House of the Swan]].<ref name="LT2Gondolin">{{HM
column3: LT2}}, "The Fall of Gondolin".</ref> In ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' Tuor's father is [[Huor]].<ref name="S18">{{S
